title: Region transfer new sesaon
body:
How about we finally unlock region transfers for the new season? Since my account's still on NA I will not be able to join the new season like everyone else. 

Not to mention what that will do to my MMR, having to change back AGAIN.

replies.body: Like [**HollyMonsters last update**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) mentioned, the transfers are still undergoing maintenance for a bit longer. It's not that their simply turned off for no reason, that'd be rather silly keeping everyone locked on a region they don't want to be on.
